pages.text: $(thing)Monks$() are a large creature found in the $(thing)Forests$() of the $(thing)Misty World$().Despite the dopey appearance, they are aggressive.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Monk$() grants 2 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using any $(item)Meat$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 6$(). Once tamed, they can be ridden with a $(item)Saddle$() and carry a chest.
